ta.title: ரயில் தாமதம்
body_lines: மிரிகாமா ரயில் நிலையத்திற்கு அருகிலுள்ள ரயில் நிலையம் அருகே ஏற்பட்ட பிழை காரணமாக இந்த ரயில் தாமதமானது.

en.title: Train delay
body_lines: Railway service has taken place on the main road.
The train was delayed due to an error near the railway station near the Mirigama Railway Station.

summary_lines: A train delay occurred due to an issue near Mirigama Railway Station, disrupting railway services on the main road.
